feature: ✓PRE AND POST IN ONE SHAKER - DUAL MIX GRIDS- EASY TO USE: stop carrying two shaker bottles to the gym, school or work. Stay prepared with the only high performance shaker that can keep you fueled for any phase of your game. Not just limited to postworkout drinks either, add bcaas to keep you working out longer. Hydracup delivers the right nutrients when you need them, from start to finish.

✓HOLDS 28oz TOTAL- 14 oz on each side. That's enough for a scoop and a half of your favorite protein drinks. No it's not a 64oz big gulp but for most of your workouts it's perfect. Conveniently have your drinks on the go when you need them.

✓DURABLE - Locking clips tested to last upwards of one million bends. The Hydracup is designed, manufactured and assembled here in the USA. The lid and bottle base are designed for the toughest workouts.
